Dear Mridul,

I hope you are doing well.

Please find attached the agreement between NIO and Gargash for GIG's reference, along with a screenshot of the email from NIO.

NIO will be receiving the car from their end and then transferring it to Gargash. This is why there was a delay in their response. NIO has the final say in this matter.




Best regards,

Jackie Merchant
